title: Calories in Crown Royal
meta_description: Learn calories in Crown Royal per 1.5 oz serving, including alcohol content, carbs, and tips for mixers—perfect for tracking intake responsibly.
assumptions: Standard 1.5 fl oz serving of 40% ABV Crown Royal Canadian Whisky, neat or on the rocks; no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by proof, brand, serving size, and dilution; alcohol calories are from ethanol. Consume responsibly and check labels.

quick_answer.text: A 1.5 oz serving of Crown Royal provides ~97 calories, primarily from alcohol with zero carbs or protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison, though alcohol isn't typically listed there.

tweaks.label: Served as a double shot (3 fl oz)
With diet cola mixer (6 oz, zero sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of Crown Royal?
faqs.a: About 97 calories in a standard 1.5 fl oz shot of 40% ABV Crown Royal.

faqs.q: Does Crown Royal have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No, Crown Royal has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars per serving—calories are purely from alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Crown Royal vs other whiskeys?
faqs.a: Similar to most 80-proof whiskeys at ~97 kcal per 1.5 oz; varies slightly by brand or proof.

faqs.q: How does mixing affect calories in Crown Royal?
faqs.a: Neat: 97 kcal. With regular cola (6 oz): adds ~70 kcal. Diet mixers add none.

faqs.q: Is Crown Royal low-calorie for alcohol?
faqs.a: Yes, at 97 kcal per serving it's comparable to other spirits; avoid sugary mixers to keep it low.
